page.title: 19A DAY AT KINLOSS SCHOOL
page.content: When I get up at 7.30pm I make my bed and have thirty minutes to wash and go to breakfast: cornflakes, orange juice yoghurt and toast. Then we have bedroom inspection. We must have clean shoes and a tidy bed area. After inspection we have assembly at 9.00am whenour headmaster talks about world affairs and asks our opinions. At 9.10am we have lessons three before break, two before lunch, which is at 1.00pm and two after lunch. After school, at 3.25pm we have a choice of: going to the sports centre for cricket or badminton, doing wood work or cookery; or swimming or tennis in the school grounds. After activities we eat at 5.30, and at 6.30 we do prep for 45 minutes. After prep we have free time, watch TT or use the computers until bed time at 9.05. Lights out is at 9.30 pm.
